articles.author: Rhea Mogul, Michelle Toh
articles.title: Four million children in Pakistan have no safe water, a year after deadly floods - CNN
articles.description: One year after catastrophic floods devastated swathes of Pakistan, some 4 million children in the South Asian nation remain without access to safe water, the United Nations children’s agency has warned.
